title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 32 - Insurance Identification Cards
content:

State Regulations
§ 32.1 - Background
§ 32.2 - Introduction
§ 32.3 - Definitions
§ 32.4 - Issuance of ID cards
§ 32.5 - Use of ID cards for DMV registration and insurance transactions
§ 32.6 - Verification of insurance coverage (validity of id cards)
§ 32.7 - Administrative action
§ 32.8 - Notice of termination
§ 32.9 - Types of ID cards and specifications
§ 32.10 - Encrypted two-dimensional (2D) bar code security feature
§ 32.11 - Prescribed forms for id cards
§ 32.12 - Insurance information accompanying id cards
§ 32.13 - Miscellaneous
§ 32.14 - Use by registrant or operator
§ 32.15 - Special id card rules applicable to policies assigned by the new york automobile insurance plan (nyaip)
§ 32.16 - Electronic insurance ID cards
§ 32.17 - Insurance card samples

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 32

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 311[10], 312 [4][5], 319[3], 370[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
